timeline.bodyText:
this should be authorized against the existing credential resource, not on account level
to do that:

add @CheckPermissionByResourceObject to the method
add @ResourceObject to the credentialrequest parameter (it is there as i see)
add @ResourceObjectField(action = AuthorizationResourceAction.EDIT_CREDENTIAL, variableType = AuthorizationVariableType.NAME) to the name field of the CredentialRequest class (I think this is done too since it is the same class as used in other crednetial controller)

so I think the method annotation should be changed only
